allow:
Bash(git commit --amend -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Productivity Intelligence System

Complete AI-powered productivity intelligence system that:
- Collects wellness data from Amazfit watches via Intervals.icu
- Calculates hourly productivity scores using circadian rhythm model
- Generates personalized insights with Claude AI
- Delivers automated daily reports to Google Docs

Features:
- Science-based productivity scoring \(two-process sleep model\)
- HRV and RHR recovery analysis
- 24 hourly productivity scores per day
- Claude AI-powered personalized insights
- Automated Google Docs delivery
- Complete setup and testing scripts
- Comprehensive documentation

Tech Stack:
- Python 3.11+
- Intervals.icu API
- Anthropic Claude API \(Sonnet 4.5\)
- SQLite database
- Google Docs API

Ready for production use!
EOF
\)")
